div.head: 喉中腥臭
div.div: malodorous stench from within the throat

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: malodorous stench from within the throat

sense.def: Alternative Names hou zhong xing qi 喉中腥氣 , malodorous qi from within the throat. Pathological Condition with a malodorous stench emitted by the throat that the patient himself is able to perceive. LSZ suggests that this is brought forth by lung heat. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry huang qin 黃芩 quoting LTY: 黃芩之苦寒，能瀉火補氣而利肺，治喉中 腥臭 , “The bitter and cold nature of huang qin is capable of draining fire and supplementing qi and of setting free the lung function. It cures malodorous stench from within the throat ”.
